                                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> selectColumns)

        Parameters:

        selectColumns - Columns that are used in SELECT clause of the query.

      • readFunctions

        public static void readFunctions()
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads function declarations from their directory. Each file in the res/function-declarations directory is parsed.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • readFunctionFromFile

        public static void readFunctionFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads multiple function declarations from the given file. Each line should declare a function. Function's name, return type, and argument types (if they exist) should be separated by commas.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the declaration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • readFunctionsFromFile

        public static void readFunctionsFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads multiple function declarations from the given file. Each line should declare a function. Function's name, argument type, and return type should be separated by commas.
        Parameters:
        file - File object of the declaration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • processQuery

        public static void processQuery(java.lang.String selectQuery,
                                java.lang.String queryName)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Processes a query. Processing includes parsing, high level data-flow graph generation, low level filter sub-graph generation, and low level select sub-graph generation. These graphs are printed to separate files.
        Parameters:
        selectQuery - String of the select query.
        queryName - Name of the query file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateGraphFile

        public static void generateGraphFile(java.io.File file)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Prints the high level data-flow graph to a file. Graph is defined in DOT language.
        Parameters:
        file - File to which graph will be printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • generateSubGraphsFile

        public static void generateSubGraphsFile(java.io.File file)
                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Prints select and filter sub-graphs to a file. Graphs are defined in DOT language.
        Parameters:
        file - File to which graphs will be printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> extractTables(net.sf.jsqlparser.statement.select.SelectBody selectBody)
        Extracts table names from a SELECT query.
        Parameters:
        selectBody - Body of the SELECT query
        Returns:
        Set of table names

                                                                  java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tables)
        Extracts the column names that are used in WHERE clause of the SELECT query.
        Parameters:

        tables - Tables used in the SELECT query.
        Returns:

      • readQueriesFromFile

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readQueriesFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads multiple SQL queries from a file. Each query should be separated by semicolons.
        Parameters:
        file - File that contains the queries.
        Returns:
        List of queries that are represented as strings.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • learnTableSchema

        public static void learnTableSchema(java.lang.String createTableQueryString)
                             throws net.sf.jsqlparser.JSQLParserException
        Extracts the schema of a table from a CREATE TABLE query. This extraction may be queried in three ways: tableOfColumnMap stores the table of each column. dataTypeOfColumnMap stores the type of each column. columnsOfTableMap stores the set of columns for each table.
        Parameters:
        createTableQueryString - String representation of the CREATE TABLE query.
        Throws:
        net.sf.jsqlparser.JSQLParserException

      • readStorageSizes

        public static void readStorageSizes()
        Reads the storage sizes of data types from a directory. Each file in res/data-types directory is traversed.

      • readStorageSizeFromFile

        public static void readStorageSizeFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads storage size of data types from a file. Type name and the storage size in bits should be separated by commas. For types that take parameters between parenthesis, size of one should be specified.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the declaration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • getDataType

        public static java.lang.String getDataType(net.sf.jsqlparser.expression.Expression expression)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds the data type of an expression.
        Parameters:
        expression - Expression of which data type will be found.
        Returns:
        Data type
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getDataSize

        public static int getDataSize(java.lang.String dataType)
        Returns the storage size of the given type.
        Parameters:
        dataType - Data type
        Returns:
        Storage size in bytes.
